body_html:
Thank you, @shoyer, @asimshankar and @concretevitamin ! I am ok with the workaround method.

Although an integrated axis argument is preferred, and make sense?

BTW, how much efficiency gain would be for an integrated axis (if implemented) compared to the work around method (stack then concatenate)?

Thank you.

body:
Thank you, @shoyer, @asimshankar and @concretevitamin ! I am ok with the workaround method.

Although an integrated axis argument is preferred, and make sense?

BTW, how much efficiency gain would be for an integrated axis (if implemented) compared to the work around method (stack then concatenate)?

Thank you.
